name: Magicraft: Balance WIP
description:
Instructions: Use arrows to play.

Description:

Magicraft will be series of games.

You feedback is really appreciated.

This is WIP version of first in series, Magicraft : Balance.

While playing simple game you will be shifting world balance. Final game will feature puzzles and daily challenges etc and will ship on all mobile platforms. This titles will set mood for upcoming series and affect them as world balance will change in 1st titles all future games will be affected by that.

We've planned 4 more DLCs after launch where you will be releasing powerful gods.

Next title will be Magicraft: Elementals. It will be all about crafting spells and raiding dungeons.

and Finally Magicraft: Arena. PC game where you can use your spells against other players in VR!
